area1.intro:
It's finally here!

Today's the day Alya sets off on her big adventure!

She wakes up in her bedroom. It's the same as always: the south-facing window, the tidy desk, the elaborate doll house in the corner.

But today, something is different. Alya can't put her finger on it, but the familiar comforts of her room seem somehow livelier than usual.

It's a great day for adventure!

 (!) HINT: Use 'examine <item>' to explore Alya's room!
area1.description: Everything in Alya's room is the same as always: the south-facing window, the tidy writing desk, the elaborate doll house in the corner.

window.description:
The morning sunlight warms Alya's face as she peers out the window. She can see her family's apple orchard below... rows of budding trees stretching all the way to the surrounding forest.

The thought of apples makes Alya's stomach rumble. What's for breakfast?

doll house.description:
Alya runs her fingers along the tiny pine-wood shingles of the doll house. For years, her sister has been saying she'd soon grow out of it, but Alya never did. She still loves placing a new piece of miniature furniture in one of the house's many rooms for her dolls to enjoy.

She can't wait to tell them about her latest adventures!

desk.description:
A stack of letters, all from Henry, takes permanent residence on the polished surface of Alya's writing desk.

Her last letter must have reached Henry a week ago. She expects to hear back from him any day now!
